      • andClauseIndexCover

        public static final Set<String> andClauseIndexCover(ElementType result,
                              Condition<TitanElement> condition,
                              IndexSerializer indexInfo)
        Returns the names of the indexes that cover this condition (i.e. can return the result set for this condition). It is assumed that the given condition is from the top level AND clause of a QNF formula.
        Parameters:

        condition -
